member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.Authentication.Owin.SitefinityAuthentication.SitefinityCookieAuthenticationOptions.TicketDataFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the Ticket Data Format. The TicketDataFormat is used to protect and unprotect the identity and other properties which are stored in the cookie value. If it is not provided a default data handler is created using the data protection service contained in the IAppBuilder.Properties. The default data protection service is based on machine key when running on ASP.NET, and on DPAPI when running in a different process.

member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.Authentication.Owin.SitefinityAuthentication.SitefinityCookieAuthenticationOptions.SystemClock
member.summary: Gets or sets the System Clock. The SystemClock provides access to the system's current time coordinates. If it is not provided a default instance is used which calls DateTimeOffset.UtcNow. This is typically not replaced except for unit testing.

member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.Authentication.Owin.SitefinityAuthentication.SitefinityCookieAuthenticationOptions.CookieManager

member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.Authentication.Owin.SitefinityAuthentication.SitefinityCookieAuthenticationOptions.SessionStore
member.summary: Gets or sets the Session Store. An optional container in which to store the identity across requests. When used, only a session identifier is sent to the client. This can be used to mitigate potential problems with very large identities.

member.name: T:Telerik.Sitefinity.Authentication.SigningUtils
member.summary: Used to guarantee integrity and authenticity of authentication message requests between Sitefinity and Sitefinity`s internal STS when logging users via code, which requires redirecting the User Agent. The class allows generation of signature and validating that signature using the user name password and the internal encryption key used by the system.
